00042 #include <unistd.h>
00043 #include <stdlib.h>
00044 #include <stdio.h>
00045 #include <fcntl.h>
00046 #include <string.h>
00047 #include <errno.h>
00048 #include <assert.h>
00049 
00050 #include <sys/types.h>
00051 
00052 #ifdef HAVE_ENDIAN_H
00053 #include <endian.h>
00054 #endif
00055 
00056 enum {
00057         /*
00058          * Maximal format name length.
00059          */
00060         DX_FMT_NAME_LEN    = 16
00061 };
00062 
00063 struct iam_uapi_info {
00064         __u16 iui_keysize;
00065         __u16 iui_recsize;
00066         __u16 iui_ptrsize;
00067         __u16 iui_height;
00068         char  iui_fmt_name[DX_FMT_NAME_LEN];
00069 };
00070 
00071 struct iam_uapi_op {
00072         void *iul_key;
00073         void *iul_rec;
00074 };
00075 
00076 struct iam_uapi_it {
00077         struct iam_uapi_op iui_op;
00078         __u16              iui_state;
00079 };
00080 
00081 enum iam_ioctl_cmd {
00082         IAM_IOC_INIT     = _IOW('i', 1, struct iam_uapi_info),
00083         IAM_IOC_GETINFO  = _IOR('i', 2, struct iam_uapi_info),
00084         IAM_IOC_INSERT   = _IOR('i', 3, struct iam_uapi_op),
00085         IAM_IOC_LOOKUP   = _IOWR('i', 4, struct iam_uapi_op),
00086         IAM_IOC_DELETE   = _IOR('i', 5, struct iam_uapi_op),
00087         IAM_IOC_IT_START = _IOR('i', 6, struct iam_uapi_it),
00088         IAM_IOC_IT_NEXT  = _IOW('i', 7, struct iam_uapi_it),
00089         IAM_IOC_IT_STOP  = _IOR('i', 8, struct iam_uapi_it),
00090 
00091         IAM_IOC_POLYMORPH = _IOR('i', 9, unsigned long)
00092 };
00093 
00094 static void usage(void)
00095 {
00096         printf("usage: iam_ut [-v] [-h] file\n");
00097 }
00098 
00099 static int doop(int fd, const void *key, const void *rec,
00100                 int cmd, const char *name)
00101 {
00102         int result;
00103 
00104         struct iam_uapi_op op = {
00105                 .iul_key = key,
00106                 .iul_rec = rec
00107         };
00108         result = ioctl(fd, cmd, &op);
00109         if (result != 0)
00110                 fprintf(stderr, "ioctl(%s): %i/%i (%m)\n", name, result, errno);
00111         return result;
00112 }
00113 
00114 static int doit(int fd, const void *key, const void *rec,
00115                 int cmd, const char *name)
00116 {
00117         int result;
00118 
00119         struct iam_uapi_it it = {
00120                 .iui_op = {
00121                         .iul_key = key,
00122                         .iul_rec = rec
00123                 },
00124                 .iui_state = 0
00125         };
00126 
00127         assert((void *)&it == (void *)&it.iui_op);
00128 
00129         result = ioctl(fd, cmd, &it);
00130         if (result != 0)
00131                 fprintf(stderr, "ioctl(%s): %i/%i (%m)\n", name, result, errno);
00132         else
00133                 result = it.iui_state;
00134         return result;
00135 }
00136 
00137 static int insert(int fd, const void *key, const void *rec)
00138 {
00139         return doop(fd, key, rec, IAM_IOC_INSERT, "IAM_IOC_INSERT");
00140 }
00141 
00142 static int lookup(int fd, const void *key, void *rec)
00143 {
00144         return doop(fd, key, rec, IAM_IOC_LOOKUP, "IAM_IOC_LOOKUP");
00145 }
00146 
00147 static int delete(int fd, const void *key, void *rec)
00148 {
00149         return doop(fd, key, rec, IAM_IOC_DELETE, "IAM_IOC_DELETE");
00150 }
00151 
00152 static int rec_is_nul_term(int recsize)
00153 {
00154         return recsize == 255;
00155 }
00156 
00157 static void print_rec(const unsigned char *rec, int nr)
00158 {
00159         int i;
00160 
00161         for (i = 0; i < nr; ++i) {
00162                 printf("%c", rec[i]);
00163                 if (rec_is_nul_term(nr) && rec[i] == 0)
00164                         break;
00165         }
00166         printf("|    |");
00167         for (i = 0; i < nr; ++i) {
00168                 printf("%x", rec[i]);
00169                 if (rec_is_nul_term(nr) && rec[i] == 0)
00170                         break;
00171         }
00172         printf("\n");
00173 }
00174 
00175 enum op {
00176         OP_TEST,
00177         OP_INSERT,
00178         OP_LOOKUP,
00179         OP_DELETE,
00180         OP_IT_START,
00181         OP_IT_NEXT,
00182         OP_IT_STOP
00183 };
00184 
00185 unsigned char hex2dec(unsigned char hex)
00186 {
00187         if ('0' <= hex && hex <= '9') {
00188                 return hex - '0';
00189         } else if ('a' <= hex && hex <= 'f') {
00190                 return hex - 'a' + 10;
00191         } else if ('A' <= hex && hex <= 'F') {
00192                 return hex - 'A' + 10;
00193         } else {
00194                 fprintf(stderr, "Wrong hex digit '%c'\n", hex);
00195                 exit(1);
00196         }
00197 }
00198 
00199 unsigned char *packdigit(unsigned char *number)
00200 {
00201         unsigned char *area;
00202         unsigned char *scan;
00203 
00204         area = calloc(strlen(number) / 2 + 2, sizeof area[0]);
00205         if (area != NULL) {
00206                 for (scan = area; *number; number += 2, scan++)
00207                         *scan = (hex2dec(number[0]) << 4) | hex2dec(number[1]);
00208         }
00209         return area;
00210 }
00211 
00212 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00213 {
00214         int i;
00215         int rc;
00216         int opt;
00217         int keysize;
00218         int recsize;
00219         int N = 0x10000;
00220         int verbose = 0;
00221         int doinit = 1;
00222         int keynul = 1;
00223         int recnul = 1;
00224 
00225         void *(*copier)(void *, void *, size_t);
00226 
00227         enum op op;
00228 
00229         char *key;
00230         char *rec;
00231 
00232         char *key_opt;
00233         char *rec_opt;
00234 
00235         struct iam_uapi_info ua;
00236 
00237         setbuf(stdout, NULL);
00238         setbuf(stderr, NULL);
00239 
00240         key_opt = NULL;
00241         rec_opt = NULL;
00242 
00243         op = OP_TEST;
00244 
00245         do {
00246                 opt = getopt(argc, argv, "vilk:K:N:r:R:dsSnP:");
00247                 switch (opt) {
00248                 case 'v':
00249                         verbose++;
00250                 case -1:
00251                         break;
00252                 case 'K':
00253                         key_opt = packdigit(optarg);
00254                         keynul = 0;
00255                         break;
00256                 case 'k':
00257                         key_opt = optarg;
00258                         break;
00259                 case 'N':
00260                         N = atoi(optarg);
00261                         break;
00262                 case 'R':
00263                         rec_opt = packdigit(optarg);
00264                         recnul = 0;
00265                         break;
00266                 case 'r':
00267                         rec_opt = optarg;
00268                         break;
00269                 case 'i':
00270                         op = OP_INSERT;
00271                         break;
00272                 case 'l':
00273                         op = OP_LOOKUP;
00274                         break;
00275                 case 'd':
00276                         op = OP_DELETE;
00277                         break;
00278                 case 's':
00279                         op = OP_IT_START;
00280                         break;
00281                 case 'S':
00282                         op = OP_IT_STOP;
00283                         doinit = 0;
00284                         break;
00285                 case 'n':
00286                         op = OP_IT_NEXT;
00287                         doinit = 0;
00288                         break;
00289                 case 'P': {
00290                         unsigned long mode;
00291 
00292                         mode = strtoul(optarg, NULL, 0);
00293                         rc = ioctl(0, IAM_IOC_POLYMORPH, mode);
00294                         if (rc == -1)
00295                                 perror("IAM_IOC_POLYMORPH");
00296                         return 0;
00297                 }
00298                 case '?':
00299                 default:
00300                         fprintf(stderr, "Unable to parse options.");
00301                 case 'h':
00302                         usage();
00303                         return 0;
00304                 }
00305         } while (opt != -1);
00306 
00307         if (doinit) {
00308                 rc = ioctl(0, IAM_IOC_INIT, &ua);
00309                 if (rc != 0) {
00310                         fprintf(stderr, "ioctl(IAM_IOC_INIT): %i (%m)\n", rc);
00311                         return 1;
00312                 }
00313         }
00314         rc = ioctl(0, IAM_IOC_GETINFO, &ua);
00315         if (rc != 0) {
00316                 fprintf(stderr, "ioctl(IAM_IOC_GETATTR): %i (%m)\n", rc);
00317                 return 1;
00318         }
00319 
00320         keysize = ua.iui_keysize;
00321         recsize = ua.iui_recsize;
00322         if (verbose > 0)
00323                 printf("keysize: %i, recsize: %i, ptrsize: %i, "
00324                        "height: %i, name: %s\n",
00325                        keysize, recsize, ua.iui_ptrsize,
00326                        ua.iui_height, ua.iui_fmt_name);
00327 
00328         key = calloc(keysize + 1, sizeof key[0]);
00329         rec = calloc(recsize + 1, sizeof rec[0]);
00330 
00331         if (key == NULL || rec == NULL) {
00332                 fprintf(stderr, "cannot allocate memory\n");
00333                 rc = 1;
00334                 goto out;
00335         }
00336 
00337         copier = keynul ? &strncpy : &memcpy;
00338         copier(key, key_opt ? : "RIVERRUN", keysize + 1);
00339         if (keynul == 0) {
00340                 free(key_opt);
00341                 key_opt = NULL;
00342         }
00343         copier = recnul ? &strncpy : &memcpy;
00344         copier(rec, rec_opt ? : "PALEFIRE", recsize + 1);
00345         if (recnul == 0) {
00346                 free(rec_opt);
00347                 rec_opt = NULL;
00348         }
00349 
00350         if (op == OP_INSERT) {
00351                 rc = doop(0, key, rec, IAM_IOC_INSERT, "IAM_IOC_INSERT");
00352                 goto out;
00353         } else if (op == OP_DELETE) {
00354                 rc = doop(0, key, rec, IAM_IOC_DELETE, "IAM_IOC_DELETE");
00355                 goto out;
00356         } else if (op == OP_LOOKUP) {
00357                 rc = doop(0, key, rec, IAM_IOC_LOOKUP, "IAM_IOC_LOOKUP");
00358                 if (rc == 0)
00359                         print_rec(rec, recsize);
00360                 goto out;
00361         } else if (op == OP_IT_START) {
00362                 rc = doop(0, key, rec, IAM_IOC_IT_START, "IAM_IOC_IT_START");
00363                 if (rc == 0) {
00364                         print_rec(key, keysize);
00365                         print_rec(rec, recsize);
00366                 }
00367                 goto out;
00368         } else if (op == OP_IT_STOP) {
00369                 rc = doop(0, key, rec, IAM_IOC_IT_STOP, "IAM_IOC_IT_STOP");
00370                 goto out;
00371         } else if (op == OP_IT_NEXT) {
00372                 rc = doop(0, key, rec, IAM_IOC_IT_NEXT, "IAM_IOC_IT_NEXT");
00373                 if (rc == 0) {
00374                         print_rec(key, keysize);
00375                         print_rec(rec, recsize);
00376                 }
00377                 goto out;
00378         }
00379 
00380         rc = insert(0, key, rec);
00381         if (rc != 0) {
00382                 rc = 1;
00383                 goto out;
00384         }
00385 
00386         rc = insert(0, "DAEDALUS", "FINNEGAN");
00387         if (rc != 0) {
00388                 rc = 1;
00389                 goto out;
00390         }
00391 
00392         rc = insert(0, "DAEDALUS", "FINNEGAN");
00393         if (errno != EEXIST) {
00394                 if (rc == 0)
00395                         fprintf(stderr, "Duplicate key not detected!\n");
00396                 if (rc != 0) {
00397                         rc = 1;
00398                         goto out;
00399                 }
00400         }
00401 
00402         rc = lookup(0, "RIVERRUN", rec);
00403         if (rc != 0) {
00404                 rc = 1;
00405                 goto out;
00406         }
00407 
00408         print_rec(rec, recsize);
00409 
00410         for (i = 0; i < N; ++i) {
00411                 memset(key, 0, keysize + 1);
00412                 memset(rec, 0, recsize + 1);
00413                 snprintf(key, keysize + 1, "y-%x-x", i);
00414                 snprintf(rec, recsize + 1, "p-%x-q", 1000 - i);
00415                 rc = insert(0, key, rec);
00416                 if (rc != 0) {
00417                         rc = 1;
00418                         goto out;
00419                 }
00420                 if (verbose > 1)
00421                         printf("key %#x inserted\n", i);
00422         }
00423 
00424         rc = 0;
00425 
00426 out:
00427         if (key) {
00428                 free(key);
00429         }
00430         if (rec) {
00431                 free(rec);
00432         }
00433         return rc;
00434 }
